title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not correctly determined.
OB: When creating a nested class using the new class wizard, the context is not correctly determined. This results in incorrect behavior and unexpected issues in the code.
EB: After creating a nested class using the new class wizard, the context should be correctly determined. This will ensure that the nested class is created within the correct scope and that it behaves as expected.
SR: To fix this issue, the new class wizard should be updated to correctly determine the context for nested classes. This could involve analyzing the current scope and ensuring that the nested class is created within the appropriate scope.
